channel.title: RSClassic - A new runescape classic server for the public!
channel.description:
[size=24pt][b]IF YOU VISITED THIS SERVER PLEASE SCAN YOUR COMPUTER IMMEDIATLY[/b][/size] - Davidi2
LINK: * Hello MoparScape, I would like to invite everyone from Moparscape to come try out a new RuneScape Classic private server that is open to the public free of charge. You can create a account in less than 10 seconds and be playing in less than 30 seconds. If you don't like it, then please let me know what I can improve on. If you encounter any issues joining, logging in, etc. then please PM me and i will help you. I just ask that you at least try it out yourself. This server has custom items, NPCS, and many other features. We are currently hiring a few ingame moderators, applications will open up within the next week or so. You can contact me via PM on here if you need any help. Thank you for taking the time to read about my newest, and latest private server. Thank you, Desion

item.title: RSClassic - A new runescape classic server for the public!
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

New Users

30/06/2012 02:06

If you would like to play our customized version of RuneScape classic, follow the steps below:

1. Register
2. Login
3. Click "Play Now" at the top
4. Hit Run when asked to do so.
5. That's It!

NOTE: Your antivirus may cause issues when downloading the cache so it is recommended that you turn off your antivirus software before attempting to play the webclient.

posted to day and theres 46 online hmm im not downloading shit also if you refresh the page registers go up each time and online users go up and down from a 100 to 50 online lol

Read full topic
